mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOD_LIKE (user_idx, lod_idx, status) VALUES (#{user_idx}, #{lod_idx}, 'B')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM LOD_LIKE WHERE user_idx = #{user_idx} AND lod_idx = #{lod_idx}
mapper.select: SELECT l.lod_name, l.lod_img_url FROM LOD_LIKE li INNER JOIN LODGMENT l ON li.lod_idx = l.lod_idx WHERE li.user_idx = #{userIdx};
